price: 70. Mise waxay leeyihiin: “jin baa ku jira?” mayee, wuxuu u keenay Xaq (Qur’aanka), badankooduse waxay diiddan yihiin Xaqa 12 (waana nabad diid).
arabic: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ بِهِۦ جِنَّةُۢۚ بَلۡ جَآءَهُم بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَأَكۡثَرُهُمۡ لِلۡحَقِّ كَٰرِهُونَ
footnotes: 12. Towxiidka, halkii ay fahmi lahaayeen ama garowsan lahaayeen.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: am yaqūlūna bihi jinnatun bal jāahum bil-ḥaqi wa-aktharuhum lil'ḥaqqi kārihūna
